channel.title: Techno?
channel.description:
well, this is my third techo/trance beat. the others were shit, but im comming along. it is really repetitive, but i change up alot in it. piano kicks in at 2:00.
listen and post please :) i need feedback.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-SKAP-YQuOA

item.title: Techno?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

lol, yeah u told me that as soon as my girlfriends brother did
it wasnt the content itself it was just a nexus application. i gotta get the DAMN contents folder lol
but ill have it today, along with cubase, fl studio producer version, and some other program that i cant remember the name lol. its good to know people that like the same shit as you

Read full topic

item.title: Techno?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

How big was the torrent you downloaded?

Nexus is a rompler, which basically means it’s a sampler you can’t load your own samples into. It needs a bunch of content to make it work, however there are torrents around which are just the application without the content, because there are third party addon packs you can use with it and some people just want to use those and don’t care about the stuff that comes with it.

You might not have the full app

Read full topic

item.title: Techno?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

im trying it under fl studio 9. and i have it. but it keeps telling me “can NOT find content”. im pretty sure i got it installed correctly, and i have even installed it under the fl studio vts plugin file :S

thanks for the reply mop.
i could make things alot better but im still not used to the program im using, and i cant get nexus to work :S

item.title: Techno?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

a bit bare… not bare enough to be minimal, but not full enough to not be, if ya get mi

pretty good for an early try though, cant fault the mixdown particularly, except maybe discover reverb :>
